title: Tetsujin 28-gou: Hakuchuu no Zangetsu
synopsis: This theatrical version based on the manga by Yokoyama Mitsuteru, deals with the genius boy detective Kaneda Shotaro and his giant robot, Tetsujin 28, set in Tokyo ten years after the end of the Second World War.
characters: ['Kaneda, Shoutarou', 'Murasame, Kenji', 'Ootsuka, Chief', 'Shikishima, Professor', 'Murasame, Ryuusaku', 'Takamizawa, Ahiru']
staff: [['Imagawa, Yasuhiro', ['Director', ' Script', ' Storyboard']], ['Yokoyama, Mitsuteru', ['Original Creator']], ['Nakamura, Takashi', ['Character Design']], ['Seyama, Takeshi', ['Editing']]]
